name: FFEFFESCAPE
desc: The FFEFFESCAPE structure passes hardware-specific data directly to the Force Feedback plugIn.

items.name: init(dwSize: DWORD, dwCommand: DWORD, lpvInBuffer: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!, cbInBuffer: DWORD, lpvOutBuffer: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!, cbOutBuffer: DWORD)
var cbInBuffer: DWORD
items.desc: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the lpvInBuffer buffer.

items.name: var cbOutBuffer: DWORD
items.desc: On entry, specifies the size, in bytes, of the lpvOutBuffer buffer. On exit, specifies the number of bytes actually produced by the command.

items.name: var dwCommand: DWORD
items.desc: Specifies a plugIn specific command number. Contact the hardware vendor for a list of valid commands and their parameters.

items.name: var dwSize: DWORD
items.desc: Size, in bytes, of this structure. This member must be initialized before the structure is used.

items.name: var lpvInBuffer: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!
items.desc: Buffer containing the data required to perform the operation.

items.name: var lpvOutBuffer: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!
items.desc: Buffer in which the operation's output data is returned.
